result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathan Thomas Mickelson

records.addlTxt: filed by Travis Satorius; hereby appointing Atty Selmer. arc

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, M.R. or residence 1348 Creekwood Drive, New Richmond, WI or M.H. or residence 651 Monette Ave Apt 14, New Richmond, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:33 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Stephanie Schmidt with Intern Lanie Krause in court. Defendant Jonathan Thomas Mickelson in court, in custody. Defendant qualifies for PD. Atty Selmer appointed. Bond arguments. Court orders bond. Court notes co-signature and will require GPS. Enters NG plea. Reserve on pre-plea rights. Court sets STC with branch 4. Adjourned 01:42 PM
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on November 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
